For the roasted spicy chicken fillets: ½ chicken breast, cut into strips
5 green chillies in brine, rinsed and finely chopped
For the salad: 3 green chillis in brine, rinsed, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the salad, place the goats' cheese, chopped chillies and spinach into a large bowl and mix.
Place the lemon juice, olive oil, honey and seasoning into a small bowl and whisk well. Pour over the salad and mix again.
For the chicken, place the chicken strips into a small bowl, add the cumin, chilli flakes, coriander seeds, chillies and half of the olive oil, mix well and leave to marinate for ten minutes.
Heat the remaining olive oil in a frying pan, add the chicken and pan fry for 3-4 minutes, or until cooked through.
Add the soy sauce and Worchestershire sauce and cook for one minute.
To serve, pile the salad onto a serving plate and top with the chicken.
title: Spinach and chilli salad with goats' cheese and roasted spicy chicken fillets
